title: Broadchurch (S1E1-8)
description:
Broadchurch is a British television crime drama broadcast on ITV, involving the death of a young boy and the search for his killer, produced by Kudos and starring David Tennant and Olivia Colman. Broadchurch premiered on 4 March 2013 at 9:00pm on ITV. It is set on the Dorset coast. After the first series ended, ITV announced that Broadchurch would return for a second series. The first series achieved overwhelming ratings for ITV, winning critical acclaim and generating huge publicity around the "whodunit" mystery.


Torrent includes:

-.mp4 files of all 8 episodes from the first series

-English subtitle files
